item.title: Alice Cooper - I Never Cry
item.description:
If there’s a tear
on my face
It makes me shiver
to the bones
It shakes me babe
it’s just a heartache
That got caught
in my eye
And you know
I never cry
I never cry
sometimes
I drink more
than I need
Until the T V’s
dead and gone
I may be lonely
but I’m never alone
And the night
may pass me by
But I’ll
never cry
Take away
take away my eyes
Sometimes
I’d rather be blind
Break a heart
break a heart of stone
Open it up
but don’t you leave
It alone
‘cause that’s all
I’ve got to give
to you
Believe me babe
it ain’t been used
My heart’s
a virgin
It ain’t never
been tried
And you know
I’ll never cry
And you know
I’ll never cry
And you know you know
you know you know
I’ll never cry
I’ll never cry

Break a heart
break a heart of stone
Open it up
but don’t you leave
It alone
‘cause that’s all
I’ve got to give
to you
Believe me babe
it ain’t been used
My heart’s a virgin
it ain’t never
Been tried
and you know
I’ll never cry
I’ll never cry
